title: Hybrid Amplitude Ordinal Partition Networks for ECG Morphology Discrimination: An Application to PVC Recognition
details: Z Cai, C Ma, J Li, C Liu - IEEE Transactions on Instrumentation and …, 2024
abstract: Various algorithms have emerged for automatic electrocardiogram (ECG) analysis, focusing on discerning subtle changes in arrhythmic morphology, especially premature ventricular contractions (PVCs). While ordinal partition networks (OPNs) …
